Hi all,

I've run crawls successfully through the web UI fine, but when I t=
ry
to run an order from the command line, I can't get it to work. I
copied =
the order and the seeds file from a crawl that ran fine in the
UI, and modi=
fied the seeds file, crawl name, and other order params.

I then try to run=
 the crawl from the command line like this:

$HERITRIX_HOME/bin/heritrix --=
nowui --admin=3Dadmin:letmein order.xml

The result is the help screen dump=
 and no error...is there a crucial
step or argument I am missing or have in=
correct?

Thanks,

Tristen
